basics.name: Taher Barakat
basics.label: Front-End Developer
basics.summary: Front-End Developer with 2+ years of professional experience at Syriatel Mobile Telecom, specializing in Angular development and responsive web applications. Skilled in building reusable components, implementing state management, and API integration, with a commitment to writing clean, maintainable code.

highlights: Maintain and enhance reporting systems related to sales, ensuring accuracy, efficiency, and scalability.
Collaborate on the development and optimization of systems built using Angular and ADO.NET to support sales reporting and analysis.
Gathering data from many sources and applying classification on it to facilitate and standardize reporting.
Make dynamic dashboards related to business scope.
Initiate special analysis reports and studies that reflect sales and marketing information analysis points of view.
Provide the concerned department with the requested reports using the latest available techniques.
Provide internal customers in MIS Management Information System with the list of eligible subscribers to certain offers.
Conduct pre-offer studies to locate segments of subscribers, spot market opportunities, and possible chances and risks.
Manage offers behavior from the database side (find eligibility and its segmentation depending on specific criteria).
Prepare yearly revenue budget template to gather all the necessary inputs from the Marketing Department and apply logical evaluation to issue yearly revenue budget.

projects.name: Sales Reporting System (SRS)
projects.description: Daily and monthly sales performance reporting system for dealers and sub-dealers network.
highlights: Generates tabular reports with sales metrics (new lines, revenue, goal achievement) and provides comparative analysis of dealer/sub-dealer performance
Organizes sales data by teams and regions for targeted performance review
My participation in SRS was implementing a mail service that allows users to customize report parameters and scheduling based on individual preferences

projects.name: Corporate Reporting System (CRS)
highlights: Tracks corporate line activations, offer subscriptions, and usage patterns also provides segmented views of VIP customer activities
Delivers standardized monthly reports for corporate account management and consolidates data from multiple billing systems into unified reports

projects.name: Product Monitoring System (PMS)
projects.description: Marketing product performance analysis tool with historical data.
highlights: Tracks subscriber counts and revenue per offer/bundle
Provides monthly activation trends through comparative charts
Enables product classification analysis (prepaid/postpaid, segment-based)
Supports marketing decisions with historical performance data
I built an admin tool for supervisors to manage roles, control table content and behavior, and modify queries/conditions dynamically.
